summary: TAKATA RECALL. I TOOK MY TRUCK TO CORTESE DODGE IN HENRIETTA NY IN JULY 2016. TWO WEEKS AGO. THEY REPLACED THE DRIVERS SIDE AIR BAG. RETURNED THE VEHICLE TO ME WITH DASHBOARD AIRBAG LIGHT ON. TOLD ME IT WAS ON WHEN I BROUGHT IT IN. I KNOW IT WAS NOT. REFUSED FURTHER WORK. IS IT SAFE TO DRIVE?
